get.description:
This endpoint uses OData. All operators are supported.

To make it as fast as possible please select the smallest required data set.

Examples:

Selecting data set: /Assets?$select=id, name, iban, currency

Filtering data set: /Assets?$filter=name eq 'CASH ACCOUNT IN CHF' or name eq 'CASH ACCOUNT IN USD'

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Limits the properties returned in the result.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Indicates the related entities to be represented inline. The maximum depth is 2.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Restricts the set of items returned. The maximum number of expressions is 100. The allowed functions are: allfunctions.

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Specifies the order in which items are returned. The maximum number of expressions is 5.

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Limits the number of items returned from a collection. The maximum value is 1000.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Excludes the specified number of items of the queried collection from the result.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Indicates whether the total count of items within a collection are returned in the result.

ytdGross.description: YTD Performance Gross (delivered by Custodian Bank)

custodianId.description: Internal identifier of a Portfolio used by Custodian

isActive.description: Flag confirming if a portfolio is active

parentPortfolioId.description: Portfolio Id of a parent from consolidation

modelPortfolioId.description: Portfolio Id of an assigned model portfolio

isManual.description: Flag indicating if it requires simulation since this is a manual portfolio

overdraftsCount.description: Number of cash accounts with negative balance

ytdGross.description: YTD Performance Gross WA Portfolio Currency (WA methodology)

ytdNet.description: YTD Performance Net WA Portfolio Currency (WA methodology)

mtdGross.description: MTD Performance Gross WA Portfolio Currency (WA methodology)

mtdNet.description: MTD Performance Net WA Portfolio Currency (WA methodology)

ytdMarket.description: YTD Market in Portfolio CCY (WA methodology)

mtdMarket.description: MTD Market in Portfolio CCY (WA methodology)

ytdCurrencyEffect.description: YTD Currency Effect in Portfolio CCY (WA methodology)

mtdCurrencyEffect.description: MTD Currency Effect in Portfolio CCY (WA methodology)

ytdPerformance.description: YTD Performance in Portfolio CCY (WA methodology)

mtdPerformance.description: MTD Performance in Portfolio CCY (WA methodology)

totalPnLPercentage.description: Total Profit and Loss as a percentage of a position value

marketPnLPercentage.description: Market Profit and Loss as a percentage of a position value

totalPnLWithCashflow.description: Total Profit and Loss including cashflows

totalPnLWithCashflowPercentage.description: Total Profit and Loss including cashflows as a percentage of a position value

fxRateFrom.description: Currency which value is converted from

fxRateTo.description: Currency to which value is converted

externalOrderId.description: Order Id of a transaction that comes from a custodian

isReversal.description: Flag confirming if a transaction is a reversal

isRiskIncreased.description: Flag confirming if a transaction is high risk

fxRateFrom.description: Currency which value is converted from

fxRateTo.description: Currency to which value is converted
